def main():
    n = int(input())
    a_list = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a_list.sort()
    a_list.reverse()
    # print(a_list)

    min_dist = a_list[0] - a_list[-1]
    for i in range(n - 1):
        min_dist += a_list[i] - a_list[i + 1]
    print(min_dist) 

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


# input
N = int(input())
a_list = list(map(int, input().split()))

# initialization
a_list.sort()

# find the minimum distance
result = float('inf')
for i in range(1, N):
    result = min(result, a_list[i] - a_list[i-1])

# output
print(result)

def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    a_list = list(map(int, input().split()))[:n]
    a_list.sort(reverse=True)

    min_dist = a_list[0] - a_list[-1]
    for i in range(n - 1):
        min_dist += a_list[i] - a_list[i + 1]
    print(min_dist)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

    result = min(result, a_list[i] - a_list[i-1])

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a_list = list(map(int, input().split()))[::-1]

    max_dist = a_list[0]
    for i in range(n - 1):

        max_dist += a_list[i] - a_list[i + 1]
    print(max_dist)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a_list = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a_list.sort(reverse=True)

    max_dist = 0
    for i in range(1, n):
        max_dist += a_list[i] - a_list[i - 1]
    print(max_dist)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
